definition: contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system

sentences.english: Being opposed to various anti-Party activities, so that supports the Party unification.
sentences.chinese: 反對各種反黨分裂活動，維護黨的團結統一。

sentences.english: The use of novels for anti-Party activity is a great invention.
sentences.chinese: 利用小說進行反黨活動是一大發明。
